definition: season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields

sentences.english: Only those sports which are practised on snow or ice are considered as winter sports.
sentences.chinese: 只有雪上和冰上项目才被认为是冬季体育运动。

sentences.english: In many countries, it also sets itself automatically to summer and winter time.
sentences.chinese: 在许多国家，它本身也设置自动夏季和冬季。

sentences.english: Winter changes the water of heaven and the heart of man into a stone.
sentences.chinese: 冬季把天上的水和人的心都变成了冰。

sentences.english: This is particularly noticeable in the winter and when driving lots of short journeys with cold starts.
sentences.chinese: 这在冬季和冷启动大量的短途驾驶时尤为明显。

sentences.english: Blooms also happen in the winter, however, when northeast winds blow offshore.
sentences.chinese: 然而，当冬季东北风吹向海洋时，水华也会出现。

sentences.english: The swamp country is inclined to poach in winter.
sentences.chinese: 这片沼泽地带在冬季一踏就陷下去。

sentences.english: The climate here is always hot, summer and winter alike .
sentences.chinese: 这里的气候总是那么热，夏季和冬季都一样。

sentences.english: The first edition of the Yi Quan Lake Winter Swim Cultural Festival took place on January 16.
sentences.chinese: 这是于1月16号举办的首届溢泉湖冬季游泳文化节。

sentences.english: This torch is then carried by a relay of runners to the site of the Summer or Winter games.
sentences.chinese: 之后这支火炬由跑者接力送至夏季或冬季比赛地点。

sentences.english: On a snow coverd winter day, you gave birth to your first child.
sentences.chinese: 在冬季大雪纷飞的一天，您生下了第一个孩子。

sentences.english: Dow Jones plans to create an index for the 2010 Winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 道琼斯公司还计划为2010年冬季奥运会设立指数。

sentences.english: Popular cold-weather beverages also can be packed with calories, fat and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 冬季里流行的饮品也富含卡路里，脂肪和糖分。

sentences.english: It in the test of whether we can fit the summer heat and winter cold.
sentences.chinese: 它在考验我们是否能适合夏季的炎热和冬季的寒冷。

sentences.english: Tropical summers of 24hr sunlight are replaced by freezing winters of continuous night.
sentences.chinese: 到了冬季，夏季不断的酷热被连续的夜间严寒所代。

sentences.english: Fall is the next-best season, then winter.
sentences.chinese: 其次是秋天最好，然后为冬季。

sentences.english: The temperature there may be 5 times higher in summer as compared to winter.
sentences.chinese: 那里的温度夏季可能比冬季高5倍。

definition: cold weather, frozen ground (idiom); bitterly cold
